title: RISC-V Hypervisors
subtitle: Where are we ? What next ?
abstract: The RISC-V H-extension (aka hypervisor extension) is suitable for both Type1 and Type2 hypervisor. We have ported two hypervisors for RISC-V: Xvisor (Type1) and KVM (Type2). We show the current state and furture work for both hypervisors.
